mdRecord.dcterms:title: The heroes of Albany. A memorial of the patriot-martyrs of the city and county of Albany, who sacrificed their lives during the late war in defense of our nation 1861-1865, with a view of what was done in the county to sustain the United States government; and also brief histories of the Albany regiments.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Clark, Rufus W. (Rufus Wheelwright), 1813-1886
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: viii, 870 p. col. front., illus., plates, ports. 24 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Albany (N.Y.)--Biography
Albany County (N.Y.)--Biography
Albany County (N.Y.)--History--Civil War, 1861-1865
